Date: Mon, 07 Dec 2020 01:41:32 +0000 
Sure, 
sounds good, thanks. 
On 
Dec 6, 2020, at 6:51 PM, wrote: 
I think we will probably want to talk to him more than once, and it may take him time to line up resources on 
this, so if it's ok with you why don't we talk to him briefly to explain the timeline and issues. That way, we can 
forward him the filing when it comes in and he'll be prepped to look into it. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Dec 6, 2020, at 6:43 PM, 
) < 
> wrote: 
Yes, but I think it would make more sense to schedule this call for Tuesday so that we already have Maxwell's 
bail application when we speak with him. 
On Dec 
5, 2020, at 12:02 PM, 
Does that work for 
you? 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: ' (CRM)" < 
Date: December 5, 2020 at 2:32:23 AM EST 
To: " 
Cc: ' 
Sure. How about noon on Monday? 
DOJ Attacha/Magistrat de liaison americain 
U.S. Embassy, Paris 
Subject: RE: SDNY case 
wrote: 
(USANYS)" 
EFTA00031965

Ofc. (33) (0)1 43 12 22 14 
Mob. (33) (0)6 13 36 16 86 
From: 
Sent: Friday, December 4, 2020 8:29 PM 
(CRM) To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: SDNY case 
Hi S 
(USANYS) 
I hope you're doing well. Ghislaine Maxwell is filing a renewed bail application on Monday, and we expect that the 
motion will raise issues relating to the possibility of extradition from France. Are you available for a call on Monday 
for a  few questions? I know we discussed this issue over the summer, and it would be very helpful to ask a few 
follow up questions. 
Thanks very much, 
From: (CRM) 
Sent: Wednesday, July 8, 2020 11:48 AM 
To: 
Subject: RE: SDNY case 
My cell tt 
is: + 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 8, 2020 5:46 PM 
To: (CRM) 
Subject: Re: SDNY case 
Thanks very much, 9 a.m. on Friday would be great. What number should I call? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 8, 2020, at 11:44 AM, (CRM) cz> wrote: 
Sure thing. Friday looks pretty open for me. Would 9am or 9:30am work for you? 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, July 8, 2020 5:38 PM 
To: (CRM) 
Subject: Re: SDNY case 
Hi 
Do you have a moment this week for a quick call? I have a  few questions about the extradition process in France 
generally, and it would be helpful to discuss. 
EFTA00031966

Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
Sent from my tPhone 
On Jul 8, 2020, at 11:21 AM, (CRM) câ€º  wrote: 
I am 
putting you in touch with who is working the Maxwell/Epstein matter in SDNY. 
She has some questions about the probably of extraditing someone from 
France who has dual 
US/French 
citizenship. 
Thx, 
EFTA00031967
